product_name: ExuvianceAGE REVERSE Day Repair SPF 30 + Retinol Antiaging Face Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleExuviance AGE REVERSE Day Repair SPF 30 + Retinol Antiaging Face Moisturizer is a daytime rejuvenating treatment with Broad Spectrum Sunscreen SPF 30, Retinol, Peptides and antioxidants for a more even, luminous and youthful-looking complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelp visibly reverse key signs of aging during the day with this daily skincare essential. AGE REVERSE Day Repair with Sunscreen Board Spectrum SPF 30 contains a proprietary multi-tasking ingredient complex with everything you need to restore smooth, firm skin and a more even complexionUV filters and a triple antioxidant formula containing pomegranate and Vitamins A and E shield skin from daily environmental aggressors and help fend off aging free radicalsThis daily use cream contains a triple firming complex of Peptides, Retinol and NeoGlucosamine to target skin's natural collagen and enhance skin plumping and firming, making wrinkles less visibleAt skin's surface, Retinol and NeoGlucosamine lightly exfoliate, diminish the appearance of uneven pigment and smooth fine lines and wrinklesResearch ResultsPercentage of respondents noting improvement after 4 weeks of Day Repair along with an Age Reverse regimen with twice daily use of BioActiv Wash and Eye Contour with Day Repair and Night Lift daily:94% skin is firmer92% fine lines are less noticeable87% age spots appear lighterKey IngredientsRetinolNeoGlucosaminePeptidesAntioxidants: Pomegranate, Vitamins A and ESPFItem 2554761How To UseHelps prevent sunburn If used as directed with other sun protection measures, decreases the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by the sun. Apply liberally to face and neck daily following cleansing, 15 minutes before sun exposure. Use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Sun Protection Measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a Broad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10am - 2pm. Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses. Children under 6 months: Ask a doctor.Precautions: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. A light peeling or tingling sensation may occur when using this high strength formulation. If uncomfortable, reduce usage to every other day until skin adjusts. Other information: Store at 15C- 30C (59F- 86F) Protect this product from excessive heat and direct sun Inactive.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 3% Octinoxate 7.5% Octisalate 5%.inactive: Aqua/water/eau, Acetyl Glucosamine, Butyloctyl Salicylate,cyclopentasiloxane, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol,butyrospermum Parkii (shea) Butter, PEG-100 Stearate,dimethicone, Cetyl Alcohol, Nylon-12, Triacontanyl Pvp,retinol, Citric Acid, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyltetrapeptide-7, Coffea Arabica (coffee) Fruit Extract, Tocopherylacetate, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Punica Granatum Extract,arginine, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Cyclohexasiloxane,caprylyl Glycol, Dimethiconol, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Xanthangum, PEG-75 Stearate, Ceteth-20, Steareth-20, Polysorbate 20,triethyl Citrate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/vpcopolymer, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Carbomer, Ethylenebrassylate, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Yellow 5 (CI 19140),red 33 (CI 17200).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Helps prevent sunburn If used as directed with other sun protection measures, decreases the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by the sun. Apply liberally to face and neck daily following cleansing, 15 minutes before sun exposure. Use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Sun Protection Measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a Broad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10am - 2pm. Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses. Children under 6 months: Ask a doctor.Precautions: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. A light peeling or tingling sensation may occur when using this high strength formulation. If uncomfortable, reduce usage to every other day until skin adjusts. Other information: Store at 15C- 30C (59F- 86F) Protect this product from excessive heat and direct sun Inactive.

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL
reviews.comments: Nothing compares. Amazing product!!! NO WHITE CAST!

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I have tried so many things every sunscreen gives me cystic acne. This is the only one that doesn't bother my skin and improves it and I love to wear it under my makeup. I can't find another SPF. This is it.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I have tried so many things every sunscreen gives me cystic acne. This is the only one that doesn't bother my skin and improves it and I love to wear it under my makeup. I can't find another SPF. This is it.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: This is my new moisturizer. Works great under any foundation liquid or cream.  Great moisturizer with added benefits. I keep returning to buy this product.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Saw improvement in my skin after 1st use

reviews.headline: Peels
reviews.comments: This product is NOT worth the money. It peels very badly so 20 min after putting it on im havjng to rub my face to get the peeling off. Then km just losing product. Will be returning

reviews.headline: Would not recommend
reviews.comments: This product turned my face into an oil slick and made me break out terribly. Do not recommend wearing under makeup. It doesnt absorb into the skin well, kind of like sun screen that is not specifically for the face. Came with a GWP and i am not familiar with the brand, so the price tag shocks me for what this is.

reviews.headline: ULTA sent me a used dried up display
reviews.comments: Ulta sent me a used display item that was half used and all dried up i posted a pic of the item half gone with the display sticker my guess ULTA doesnt want it known they send used products

reviews.headline: Does not absorb
reviews.comments: I normally like this brand & see good results with the products, but this one is a miss. When applied it goes on smoothly. After it dries it will pill up, especially if you try to apply foundation on top. It turns into a flakey mess. I am glad I received this as a deluxe sample when I purchased other items.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love!!!!
reviews.comments: As a Florida resident I was trying so many other products which had lead my skin to sunburn,allergic reaction and pimples.I'm forever grateful for the lady at Ulta who introduced me to this brand.I'm really satisfied with the sun protection without any negative side effects.Also reduced my dark spots,fine lines.My skin looks refreshed instead of sun damaged.I apply only once in the morning and that works for me.If I decide to go to the pool or the beach I apply before once again.If you live in a tropical place this is definitely a must have for you!

reviews.headline: Amazing product!!!!
reviews.comments: I actually mix this 50/50 with my tinted sunscreen. It is creamy and beautiful and blends seamlessly with anything you might add to it. Also great stand alone. You won't be disappointed. Originally received as a deluxe sample. I immediately went back to purchase the full size!

reviews.headline: Nice but...
reviews.comments: I received a sample of this product with purchase. It's a very nice moisturizer and sunscreen but for the price, I want more verification that the retinol is an effective type and dosage to do what it says.

reviews.headline: Pricey but WORTH IT!
reviews.comments: Not greasy and I can wear this under makeup - smell goes away in a minute and it makes my skin feel smooth and hydrated even though I'm combo/oily.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I've used this for years--first recommended by my dermatologist as Neostrata, but Exuvience is the same exact product. I have dry skin and like the rich feel. It dries down and is perfect for next steps of primer and foundation (It Cosmetics CC Cream). Expensive, but I always wait for the sale. Worth it!

reviews.headline: It's ok
reviews.comments: It's okay. I have very sensitive skin. This didn't really work well with my sensitive skin type. It also felt rough to apply to the skin. It's not worth the price, in my opinion.

reviews.headline: Good Product-Bad Container
reviews.comments: I like the product, but have constant issues with container.  Dispensing is cumbersome.  It either seems to clog or the pump doesn't work. Too expensive for this issue.

reviews.headline: It pills.
reviews.comments: Pretty decent but it pills. Not worth the price tag in my opinion.

reviews.headline: Light weight
reviews.comments: I have oily skin and I love this sunscreen. Doesn't make my makeup melt. Gives me a non greasy glow if that makes any sense.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Use this twice a day

reviews.headline: Can't live without!
reviews.comments: I am not clear why a review said formulas have changed. They have not. They are exactly the same, just different packaging. This moisturizer made changes for me very early on. I absolutely love it, as I do most of these products. They are medical grade.. and so you use very little! This Customer started 4 years ago using products 56 now.. customer for life. Excellent products!

values.label: In the AM under my makeup or alone as my SPF

Absolutely hate the tube it comes in.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: I buy this product and stock up when on sale and

display_values: I buy this product and stock up when on sale and

media.headline: yes this is the second tube I have purchased
media.caption: This was from a hair show a few years back

faceoff_positive.comments: I got this product because I am one that has spent numerous hours under the exposure of the sun and I needed something that would heal and restore my skin. This sun damage on my face is pretty noticeable for my age considering that I already have dark age spots. I wasn't sure if this cream would work for me or not. I went ahead and got it because I am pretty desperate to reverse the signs of aging on my skin. After a few weeks of use, I noticed that my fine lines were disappearing and my age spots were lightening up pretty dramatically. I think it's safe to say that this product is making a big difference in my skin! I cannot wait to see what continued use will do for me!
faceoff_positive.headline: Diminishes Signs of Sun Damage!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have combination skin and get small breakouts on occasion. This moisturizer didn't cause breakouts, but it's just too greasy for me. It left my skin looking oily as soon as I put it on and throughout the day my face would be greasier and shinier than usual. It moisturizes well and you don't need to use much, but there weren't any other noticeable benefits after using this for several months. I don't feel it's worth the price. I'll finish the tube but will be trying a different product when it's gone.
faceoff_negative.headline: Doesn't work for me

rollup.name: AGE REVERSE Day Repair SPF 30 + Retinol Antiaging Face Moisturizer
